author: Simon Difford
description: Over the decades the recipe the Fish House Punch has constantly morphed. The inclusion of cold tea is a contemporary adaptation.
name: Fish House Punch #2
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
45 ml Brewed cold black breakfast tea

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
